mSource.sol":{"keccak256":"0x38af39fef78fa83313487214faa53b7771c10e434ca0ca5d076e1717f8805a3c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7b37f95aea65a19d249b630efee27ee25801bc20f6b705d1e62892779885ebc7","dweb:/ipfs/QmVNpQvncvjKw1jZt6RWqjVP8qQ5m3RKAEbc2RUFhJx7zC"]},"src/teleporter/ITeleporterMessenger.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd7e65113e7558b6e222adaefdd04d896956944446fc497b463709960e48318b7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://e07d218bc647c95b074449220522a58e6c48dd28836af3cc90627a0258f419d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmVGaXLjaRTa1qjFQUEpV6MBUMkyEo5yNYeCNmgBRpWb7A"]},"src/teleporter/ITeleporterReceiver.sol":{"keccak256":"0x51c66e7bdd0e86b42d2b2a97edcabec5d520ba175dde15be7cb0fd7d8a5ca340","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c14e58c20404a981fcb1d75d64e6961e845ff985cd56c2f7ba5e4001dc0f9221","dweb:/ipfs/QmeKadx9USvi5K2kqbRNmdEmS8UZeCZBVqgvygmERxeUSd"]}},"version":1}

params._avaLoomBlockchainId: Blockchain ID of the AvaLoom L1.
params._avaLoomHubAddress: Address of the AvaLoomHub on the AvaLoom L1.
params._teleporterMessenger: Address of the TeleporterMessenger on this chain.

lockNft(address,uint256,address,uint256).details: Checks: NFT exists, not already locked, caller owns and has approved. Effects: update escrow. Interactions: transferFrom, (optional) fee transfer/approve, sendCrossChainMessage.

params.feeAmount: Amount of fee tokens for the relayer.
params.feeTokenAddress: ERC20 address for relayer fee (use address(0) and 0 amount for no fee).

receiveTeleporterMessage(bytes32,address.details: Only callable by Teleporter. Checks: sender, decode. Effects: clear escrow. Interactions: safeTransferFrom.

AVA_LOOM_BLOCKCHAIN_ID().notice: AvaLoom L1 blockchain ID (destination for lock messages).

AVA_LOOM_HUB_ADDRESS().notice: AvaLoom Hub contract address on AvaLoom L1.

LOCK_MESSAGE_REQUIRED_GAS().notice: Gas limit for delivering the lock message on the Hub (recommended 300kâ€“500k).

TELEPORTER_MESSENGER().notice: Teleporter messenger used for cross-chain messages.

isLocked(address,uint256).notice: Returns whether an NFT is currently locked.

lockNft(address,uint256,address,uint256).notice: Locks an NFT in this contract and sends a cross-chain message to the AvaLoom Hub to mint a V-NFT.

receiveTeleporterMessage(bytes32,address.notice: Receives a cross-chain message from the Hub to release an NFT to the buyer.
